attributes.action: Educate students on violation around the world & UK is a great country to be in.
attributes.additional_details:
Lot's of people get violated because of what they are, or who they are, many get violated because of their status, and many get violated because they don't have what other's have and were doing this petition to see if people agree with our campaign or don't agree with us. 
Please sign this petition to show that you agree with our aims and goals so the government knows about it.
attributes.background: Our focus is to educate and raise awareness that violation isn't right and people should know how harmful it is to people who are violated.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
